short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Bytes & Spokes, your personal Career Copilot! Get AI-powered actionable insights to help you win the job you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use this extension with LinkedIn and Indeed to import jobs to the Bytes & Spokes platform.

Features:
1. Track all your job opportunities together through an intuitive real-time dashboard
2. Get Real-time actionable insights on your resume, interview feedback, and job opportunities
3. Get Tailored resource recommendations to boost your job search performance
4. Manage AI-suggested to-do list prioritization to optimize your efforts across all your job opportunities.
5. You can also unlock 1-1 coaching support to keep you motivated and on track

And that's not all, now you can give a boost to your job search by leveraging our referral community. It's as simple as :
1. Import a job from LinkedIn or Indeed.
2. We will auto-create a referral document for you. You can add your personal message. 
3. Send requests to multiple referrers with a single click. 
4. You will be notified when referrers accept your request. 
5. Connect with referrers to share your resume. 

Not a member of Bytes& Spokes yet?
visit: https://www.bytesandspokes.com/new_signup/jobseeker
